tool_description: An API with the latest Fuel News around the world
title: Fuels Live

api_list.name: Get Individual News based on Press Name
api_list.description: This endpoint will return news from a specific press resource
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fuels-live.p.rapidapi.com/fuels/{pressid}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fuels-live.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Fuel News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all news about Fuel from all over the world
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fuels-live.p.rapidapi.com/fuels"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fuels-live.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
